suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for device_source_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.device_exposure`as record2 where device_exposure.device_exposure_id = record2.device_exposure_id and device_source_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))

suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for device_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.device_exposure`as record2 where device_exposure.device_exposure_id = record2.device_exposure_id and device_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))

suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for device_type_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.device_exposure`as record2 where device_exposure.device_exposure_id = record2.device_exposure_id and device_type_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))
